directions: In a medium bowl, thoroughly mix white corn, black beans, Italian-style salad dressing, ranch-style salad dressing, onion, hot pepper sauce, cilantro, chili powder and ground black pepper. Chill in the refrigerator 8 hours, or overnight, before serving.
ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained
title: California Bean Dip
